result.title: Compiling oddity
result.content:
lately i was trying to create some simple problems using polygon i have generated some test cases and a solution everything was working alright until someone submitted a correct solution and he was getting a "wrong answer on test 4". you may think that i had made some faults in the input files etc ... The problem is that we had some strange compiler comportment ,the same code getting an accepted ,and a wrong answer if we add an initialization for the variable "res" (we will read the res's value anyways so how can it make a difference? )

even if i had problems in my problem how can that be interpreted differently

infos about the problem : input : t test cases up to 100 each test case N integers up to 10^12

output a single integer for each test (the maximum of the N integers )

check the screenshot https://ibb.co/g07bSn

thanks in advance.
